items.sentence: Tom didn\'t want to wear the shirt that his mother had gotten him for Christmas.
Tom managed to escape from the room where his kidnappers had kept him locked up.
Tom was going to be transferred to Boston, but they decided to fire him instead.
Tom was killed in a traffic accident within 10 hours of graduating from college.
What I really want is for Tom to teach me how to play a few chords on my guitar.
